article_title: Coronavirus: What’s open, closed — and cancelled — in London, Ont. - Global News
article_description: Concerns over COVID 19  the illness caused by the novel coronavirus  mean plans have changed all over London this weekend
article_content: There s a long list of closures and cancellations in London this weekend as a result of the novel coronavirus pandemic The virus  which causes the disease COVID 19  was classified as a pandemic by the World Health Organization after it spread worldwide  wit   4130 chars
